provisions.part: Part I – Establishment of Commission and its functions
provisions.title: Establishment of Fisheries Commission
provisions.content: There is established by this Act a Fisheries Commission referred to in this Act as “the Commission”. There is established by this Act a Fisheries Commission referred to in this Act as “the Commission”.

provisions.part: Part I – Establishment of Commission and its functions
provisions.title: Functions of Commission
provisions.content: (1) The Commission shall be responsible for the regulation and management of the utilization of the fishery resources of Ghana and the co-ordination of the policies in relation to them. provisions.part: Part II – Composition of Commission and related provisions
provisions.title: Composi­tion of Commis­sion
provisions.content: The Commission shall consist of the following persons— a Chairman who is not a Minister of State or a Deputy Minister; a Chairman who is not a Minister of State or a Deputy Minister; the Executive Secretary referred to in section 15 of this Act; the Executive Secretary referred to in section 15 of this Act; one representative from each of the following bodies nominated by the body concerned who shall not be below the rank of a Deputy Director and in the case of functional groups not below the rank of a vice-chairman or its equivalent— Ministry of Transport and Communications; Ministry of Transport and Communications; Ministry of Defence; Ministry of Defence; Ministry of Environment; Ministry of Environment; Ministry of Food and Agriculture; Ministry of Food and Agriculture; Ghana National Association of Farmers and Fishermen; Ghana National Association of Farmers and Fishermen; National Fisheries Association of Ghana; National Fisheries Association of Ghana; Ghana Tuna Association; Ghana Tuna Association; Ghana Marine Fishing Officers Association; Ghana Marine Fishing Officers Association; Fish Smokers Association Fish Smokers Association Institute of Aquatic Biology Institute of Aquatic Biology the Ghana Irrigation Development Autho­rity; and the Ghana Irrigation Development Autho­rity; and four persons at least two of whom shall be women. four persons at least two of whom shall be women.

provisions.title: Resignation
